review: Dr Pallavi, besides being a warm friendly person, is professionally very sound. She comes in to deal with the crucial problem, and ensures you are comfortable and satisfied, after the treatment. Dr Pallavi has a very efficient team, and she coordinates beautifully. One can be rest assured, one will return extremely satisfied, after a brilliant job done.

review: I was quite satisfied the way the  plan for my dental treatment was explained. She spent adequate time answering all my queries patiently . Dr Pallivi ,Dr Dhawani & her team were simply great. Thier set up is highly recommended for your dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I, Smita Shivalkar went through surgery performed by Dr. Vipin Mahurkar, Periodontice. He performed the surgery of implants in place of missing teeth.  The procedure was totally painless thanks to good anaesthesia. The process of implants settling and gum healing went very smoothly, without any complications, which was confirmed by Dr. Vipin Mahurkar with a couple of follow-up appointments. During the most recent appointment, after the surgery, I was happy to hear from Dr Vipin Mahurkar that my implants are ready for the last stage-putting the makeup teeth with crowns and this procedure was done by Dr Pallavi Mahurkar, (cosmatic Dentistry & smile designing specialist).  Dr Pallavi and Dr Dhwani Kapadia were working patiently on me to give me replacement of missing teeth as well as my smile. Overall I’m very happy with the work that Dr. vipin Mahurkar & Dr Pallavi Mahurkar and their entire team has done for me. I have been feeling great and more confident ever since the surgery. I couldn’t have done it without Dr Vipin & Dr Pallavi's special skillset and support, so thank you!  I will highly recommend Dr Vipin Mahurkar  & Dr Pallavi Mahurkar to everyone who is afraid of visiting Dentist.

Date : 21/04/2016
From the moment I stepped into Synergy Dental Clinics, Pune, I knew I was in very capable hands. I came with my very own set of unique and challenging issues, that was NEVER too much for Dr.Pallavi, Dr.Vipin & Dr.Shraddha and their team to handle.
After a blind examination, upon which my needs were identified and recommended action discussed (same needs as already outlined in my home country) we set about a plan of action. Much work was to redo a third parties dentistry previously undertaken in my home country, which had culminated in eventual destructive infections, cysts and additionally bone loss caused by that.
Dr.Pallavi (a renowned Dentist & Cosmetic Smile Design Artiste) Dr.Vipin  ( a renowned Dentist & Dental Implantologist), Dr. Shraddha (a renowned and deftly skilled dentist) and Dr. Ashwini (a renowned Dentist & Root Canal Specialist) partnered with the very able and peerless technician,  Mr.Wasim (a renowned Crown and Veneer Specialist), managed to work nothing short of magic on my infected and receding gums , broken, decaying and damaged teeth AND for a patient with a lifelong lack of confidence in my smile and teeth, managed to transform me, to give me a beautiful, entirely natural smile with the best quality porcelain veneers and crowns on the market today, priced affordably which allowed me a first-time confidence in my smile. A smile, I have NEVER had.
Further assisting this team was a group of assistants from Ziya who kept me organized with all the intricate timings and arrangements to Vaishnavi, Vishmita, Rani who cared for me and knowledgably and expertisely assisted with dental work at hand.   
To Dr. Pallavi and the Dental Team and her very able and professional dental assistants and office manager, my many many thanks and heartfelt gratitude for an experience that was superb and for giving me the opportunity to smile, in a way I hadn’t done since I was a little girl, a long long time ago. 
Thank you!
Warmest and Sincere Regards,
Bernadette Collins

I have visited her for Root canal treatment. she explained my problem and diagnosis in detail. ** ********* *** **** ********* *** ********** ********. I would like to thank her and definetly recommend him for all dental issues.   
     Thanks to Dr. Pallavi  & synergy team

** **** *** ******* ****** *** ********** *** ********* *** ********* ** *** ****** ********** ** ********* ***** **** *** ****** ******* *** **** **** ******* We have had for several year about visiting the dentist. We both felt very secured in her hand causes. She is extremely gentle and makes the entire experience Pain Free. Her staff is also very courteous and professional. Over all we are very happy with the dental treatment which is taken by Dr.Pallavi and her Staff.

I visit Synergy Dental Clinic for normal cleaning and bleaching process. I was overwhelm by their professional behavior. I was very happy with their service. Thank you so much Synergy Dental Clinic and their team. Would surely recommend them to my friends and family members.

I had lots of calculus build up on my teeth. The cleaning was done very nicely and really well and they given me proper instructions how to brush my teeth. So that in future same problem will not occur.
I had very good experience with synergy dental clinic. Thank you synergy dental clinic team

I have undergone treatment of Root canal at Synergy Dental Clinics. All my Root canal treatments were executed with lots of care and comfort. The treatment were almost painless. Cost As well as time was also saved. Modern Instruments were used. The caps put after Root canal treatment were very comfortable and done with the conservative method. 
All my family members are patients to Synergy Dental Clinics.

I visited doctor first and I was really happy with the way she understood my problem and she suggested me the treatment that needs to be done. I got my RCT done with doctor Pallavi and it is painless and comfortable. It was very great visiting in Synergy Dental Clinic. Charges are also normal as compared to other doctors, I would definitely recommend this clinic to my friends and relatives.
Thank you Synergy Dental Clinic Staff.

review:
I was suffering from loose dentures since a decade. At Synergy Dental Clinic i found a full proof solution for my loose  dentures. I underwent implant surgery for four upper jaw. The implant surgery absolutely painless and I was comfortable with in two days.
     I highly appreciate Dr. Vipin Mahurkar's skill.I am thank full to synergy dental clinics and team

My experience with dr.Pallavi was very very good… I am very glad she was able to attend to me n was very comfortable with her friendliness sincerity excellence dedication in my work n respect her for her patience n cordiality towards me..thank u dr.Pallavi… keep up the good work 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
On the very first I was very much impressed with the implants explanation given Dr. Vipin and Dr. Pallavi.
I immediately decided to go for implants at Synergy Clinics because the Clinics has many rooms with additional 2 more are working here. 
The madam Dr. Pallavi explained about the implants plan along with the fee structure .
We have accepted the plan and within 3 days my implants with the removal of 8 teeth  and 6 implants on one single day.
After 3 rd day I have received my teeth back. I am very happy and thankful to Dr. Vipin Dr. Pallavi,Dr. Dhvani , Nishant , Damiani, Ms. Nisha and Ms. Sonali along with other staff members 

Thanks 

Hilary Mathos 
Str. Engineer 
Vasai .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The Doctors and support staff are always very caring, which makes the patient feel comfortable while they carry out the procedures. I'm quite satisfied with the treatment, and my own experience with Synergy for over 12 years have been really very good 😊

My experience at the clinic has been great. First they listen to the patient very carefully and take interest in explaining diagnosis and treatment to the patient. The Doctor has carried the treatment in a highly professional manner, the staff has been supportive in the administrative process. Proper advice has been given me throughout the treatment one of the highlights of the treatment was availability of medicines in the clinic itself this made very convenient for me. I was impressed by the post operative follow-up.
Thanks Doctor Vipin and Synergy Dental Clinic Staff.

i was suffering from loose dentures , was unable to chew food and my dentures were causing lot of embarrassment for me socially .
I was  recommended to Dr Vi[pin by Dr Hazare. Dr Vipin suggested to convert my dentures to implant supported dentures. i had to undergo implant surgery with two implants in  my lower jaw . this made my dentures semi fixed . 
I am satisfied by my dentures now , i am able to chew food properly . Thanks to Dr Vipin and his team for excellent work .

Mr SajjanSingh Pardeshi.

I  stay abroad, came to know about Synergy Dental Clinics from my parents. I am completely in praise for Synergy Dental clinic's staff and treatments methods. I underwent immediate removal of tooth and immediate implant placement. The procedure went very smoothly beyond my expectations.
Dr. Vipin is an expert in implants, he takes care of his patients very gently. Dr. Pallavi gave me a beautiful tooth on my implant. The tooth is perfectly matching the adjacent teeth perfectly.I regularly visit Synergy Dental Clinics for recall treatments.
Aparna shere.

My first impression about Pallavi was that she really cares about your dental health and she is willing to work with you to accommodate your needs. I have a serious fear of Dentist but she was very informative and made me feel relaxed. She guided me through my x-ray and took the time to explain what she thinks the next steps should be, making sure I understood the process. She is very thorough and knowledgeable but was also very personable and friendly. I am really thankful to her and her entire staff for a very warm and fear free experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My name is Pooja shetty .had visited the doctor for root canal .it was just done in just one sitting.it was my first visit to the clinic .really happy impressed and satisfied the way the procedure was done from start till end .the staff is very polite humble and friendly.all safety protocols were followed .they use high tech technology at the clinic.very happy with the service .dr  Pallavi and dr vipul are highly professional and experienced doctors.very  .I m glad I m in safe hands .would surely recommend to my family and friends.I had a very good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was my 1st ever medical treatment. In my life so far have never visited any Dr for more than cold-cough or viral infections.So was very nervous but Dr Pallavi had been calm to explain everything and highlighted the intensity of the issue on the stage at which I visited and had to undergo the treatment, as also I was under pain.she made me feel at ease..and treatment went well also her assistant Dr Saloni was supportive and patient enough with my concerns.Thanks Practo and Synergy Center. Would surely recommend it.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr.Pallavi was extremely calm and composed , she really knew what she had to do after examining me and gave me a lot more information that I needed about my ‘TEETH’. While it was my first time , she kept updating me as to what’s next and she kept telling me the Terminology for everything that she used whether Instrumentals used or the process of the whole dental issue . She made me really feel comfortable and everyone around her too kept me comfortable and very warm hearted . Great experience and would definitely recommend her to my other Family and Friends.

Totally sensitive free and smooth procedure. Took care to see that there was no discomfort. Gave good amount of time to complete the routine.
Doctor was very professional and patient enough to treat me.Also the facility has good infrastructure

Very well satisfied with the treatment given, nicely explained about the problems and treatment required. Precision of treatment is highly appreciable. Hygienic clinic, Thank you synergy dental clinic team

My visit to Synergy Dental Clinics for the treatment of tooth was a pleasant experience. The diagnosis and the treatment  there on was professional underlining the experience of the Doctors. The entire staff was courteous and co-operative.

I would like to take a moment to say we received high quality dental treatment and personal care and attention at your office. You and your staff took the time to explain the nuances of the dental treatments to us. The hygiene standards at your clinic were very good and your staff was extremely warm and friendly. Thank you for the satisfying experience at your clinic.

I would certainly recommend you and your clinic to family and friends.

Dr. Aqeel Reshamwala - A special thanks to you for referring Dr. Pallavi Kendrekar to us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi, 

Synergy Dental at Borivali is an excellent one stop solution for all your dental problems and smile correction. They have a very good set up and proficient team lead by Dr. Pallavi Kendrekar and Dr. Vinay Mahurkar. All staff are cordial and caring including Dr. Sonyabai, Nurse Damini etc but the one Dr who is impressive and make you most comfortable is Dr Dhwani Kapadia.. *** ** *** **** ** *** ***. Keep up the good work Synergy.

My 3 month long dental treatment (root canal, two dental implants, deep scaling...) completed yesterday.
My experience with Synergy: 
Excellent treatment & care, expert doctors, polite staff, well equipped clinic.

Deepa Teksingh Pujara 
Former Scientific Officer 
Govt Research Institute

Before visiting Synergy Dental Clinic I had up mind to remove my tooth which was paining a lot but Dr.Pallavi explained to me the importance of saving the tooth. As I had a previous bad experience on the dental chair. I was hesitant and scared to started a dental treatment by my fear were over come by the painless treatment provided me by Dr.Pallavi.

I have taken Root Canal Treatment at Synergy Dental Clinic. I did not have any pain during the treatment. I am glad to take the treatment in Synergy Dental Clinic. I am very satisfied with my treatment which was followed by a ceramic crown. Thanks to Synergy Dental Clinic I have no pain anymore.

The atmosphere was very professional right from entring in the clinic to how well they explained me about my treatment. Previously, I had very bad experience regarding Root Canal Treatment. Which made me very apprehensive regarding dental treating. But when I underwent painless Root Canal Treatment . I was very happy this gave me confidence to undergo Implant which was needed.
I am very happy with their treatment and now my whole family is their patients.

Thanks Doctor Pallavi and her Staff.

Dr. Vipin Mahurkar is a very gentle and polite doctor. I have done two Implants at Synergy Dental Clinics. Treatment was very comfortable and painless. At Synergy Dental Clinic payment options are also very flexible. I had given option of paying in installments. 
Thanks to Synergy Dental Clinic for co-operation. Thanks to Dr.Vipin, Dr.Pallavi, Dr.Rupal and entire staff.

context: Dental Fillings,Composite tooth filling,Dental Crowns,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
Dr. Pallavi introduced me to the new concept of Oral Rehabilitation that is  setting up the bite in lay man term.  All my teeth were getting grinned. Even i was loosing good teeth.  At Synergy Dental Clinic, Full Mouth Rehabilitation  treatment was started for me. My Bite was restored and all my dental problems has come to and end.
Thanks to Doctor and Synergy Dental Clinics staff.

Umesh Dhopeshwarkar

context: Scaling / Polishing,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Implant Prosthesis,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
Thanks Synergy Dental Clinic and Dr. Pallavi  I have taken many treatments including Implant Surgery at Synergy Dental Clinic. I had Excellent experience and all my treatments were smooth sailing. All my family members are taking treatment from her and we all are happy.
My grand daughter is also taking Ortho treatment and all the sittings are explained well. Appointments schedule is properly informed.
Thanks to Dr. Pallavi and her staff.

Veena Gore

My experience here was great first i good very scared to visit Dental clinic and take dental treatment. But when, visited to Synergy Dental Clinics, all my fear were vanished by the friendly Doctors and staff. They took ample amount of time to explain me my problem and treatment plan they advice me answering my each and every query.
I am very thankful to Dr. Pallavi and Dr Rupal and hole staff.

All over experience is fabulous I love being part of Synergy Dental Clinic family, everyone here are very kind and co-operative. All the doctors and staff are very friendly and humble. I never felt that i am under going a treatment rather I had been a treatment with almost Love and Care.
Wishing you all the best and thanks a lot for gifting me a pleasurable time with you all and a good smile.
Thanks Dr.Pallavi Kendrekar and Synergy Dental Clinic Team.

context: Dental Implant Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),Tooth Extraction,
review:
I have undergone treatment with Dr.Pallavi kendrekar for past 15 years. I traveled all the way from Australia for gating dental treatment. we trust her dental skills and never had any untoward experience during treatment. My treatment including implants surgery, Root Canal treatments, crowns were all executed smoothly. I am really great full to Dr. Pallavi and Synergy Dental Clinics .

Thanks 
Amit anturkar

Nice doctor would definitely recommend both the doctors. Dr.Pallavi and Dr. Rupal the appointment started on time & the treatment recommended by the doctor was well explained and was treated very nicely. And they do not over charge you for the treatment and they don't misguide you everything was transparent charges no he done charges .
Thanks
Bhagyashri

context: Composite Bondings,Inlays and Onlays,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: Synergy Dental Clinics has very good stander of treatments. All treatments right from root canal treatment to implant surgery all are executed with lot of care and details.Dr Vipin Mahurkar is very gentle and genuine doctor. At Synergy dental clinics lot of payment options i available. Bajaj Finserv EMI Facility also available.You cal easily afford costly treatment at synergy dental clinics

The treatment detailing and experience has been good. I would advice that there is discussion on number of sitting required to be plan. The overall treatment cost was beyond my budget but their easy EMI options made it easy for me even financially dental problems are resolved effectively by Dr. Pallavi has been very professional in treating. Thank you Dr.Pallavi Kendrekar and Synergy Dental Clinic team.

Sushmita Shetty

I m under treatment of Dr pallavi quite some time . *** ** **** ********** ** *** ***** she makes the patient very comfortable and explain very well about the treatment. whatever treatment she has given me in the last visit it has relived my pain, she had work on my front teeth it has changed my look and my pronunciation has improved i missed my last appointment due to some problem i will take my next appointment as soon as possible .

This is my second visit.I felt Dr Pallavi  was very clear in explaining what was involved in the procedures. I felt i could trust her.I asked her how she rated herself as a dentist! she felt 6/7 out of 10,which was a modest score from her. After the treatment she asked me laughingly, it was my turn to rate her work as a dentist.. I said to her i felt perhaps 8 or maybe 9 out of 10.My total experience with the practice was very positive. Thank you.

Service is very excellent. Doctor is well qualified. Clinic is hi tech. Latest technology and facilities are available. Doctor is very polite and help me to feel comfortable.Doctor and all the staff is very friendly. 
Overall very good experience with Synergy Dental Clinic team.

I was recomended Synergy Dental Clinic for Smile Designing by my friend who had her smile over at synergy. When I visited synergy, I was extremely careful that my case is in a good hand.
They had very systematic and a comprised treatment plan for my case. I was very happy with the outcome of my treatment.
They gave me a very beautiful smile which I deserved.

Thanks,
Sadhana Deshmukh.

I had dental problem since mychildhood. My dental problem came to end after meeting Dr.Pallavi. She not only did dental treatment but she explained  me the prevention methods of dental disease. she gave me demonstration of brushing technique. She also sowed me other cleaning methods such as flossing and water-pick.
Thanks to Synergy Dental Clinics. 
Dr, Sachin jadhav

review:
I visited Synergy Dental Clinic for smile designing. Dr.Pallavi Kendrekar is extremely efficient in her smile designing practice.
My before and after smile has drastic change hereby boosting my self confidence. I would strongly recommend Synergy Dental Clinic to anyone who wants a better and perfect smile.

I had problem of bad smelling from by mouth. At Synergy Dental Clinic, they suggested me to do cleaning and polishing. Doctors gave very good advise on brushing methods. My full family was benefited by this advice. This made  me aware of the prevention of Dental disease. Thanks
Gaurav

I was recommended Synergy dental clinic by my friend.I was extremely happy with their dental services.The complete treatment was painless and all the doctors were good and gentle.they give reminder for the appts regularly.Synergy Dental Clinics is highly recommended by me
Sheetal Raisoni

At,  Synergy Dental clinics, all the Doctors and staff members are very co-operative. They share lot of information with the patient. It this helps in proper understanding of the treatment. Special thanks to Dr Pallavi and Dr Vipin Mahurkar for wonderful treatment.

Shivani Gore

I visited to Synergy Dental Clinic for my Implant placement. The Implant synergy was performed with no pain and discomfort. The cleanliness of the clinic  and staff member was comfortable. I still have to undergo to more Implants. I would like to thank Dr Vipin and his Team, I will recommend Synergy Dental Clinic to my friends and relatives.

I had lot fear of dental treatment.But after visiting Synergy Dental clinics.Dr Pallavi removed my fear of dental treatment.She explained me the importance of dental  health and how to maintain it. Myself and my whole family is benefited by her suggestions

Synergy Dental Clinics has superb infrastructure and very efficient Doctors i have done metal free crown for my front teeth. The color matching is very nicely done. I am very happy with the new set of teeth I have recommended Synergy Dental Clinics to my relatives and friends.

I am patient to Dr Pallavi Kendrekar since last 10 years . she is very good in her treatment planning . staff members at Synergy Dental clinics is very efficient and caring . I have undergone implant surgery  from Dr Vipin Mahurkar.  the surgery was made very easy by Dr Mahurkar.
I regularly visit synergy for follow up treatment.
Suwarna Mahajan

I have undergone implant dental surgery at Synergy Dental Clinics.
The procedure was done with great ease and in one sitting. there was no swelling and pain in the treatment done area i recommend SYNERGY clinics to my friends and relatives.
Mrs Vidya Patil

i have undergone  extensive dental treatment in Synergy Dental Clinics. Dr Vipin Mahurkar has done 6 - 7 implants with minimal discomfort. rehabilitation treatment was done with thorough treatment planning, and meticulously executed.
my upper front teeth were delivered with in one day in Synergy Dental Laboratory . this made my job very convenient and less time consuming. Thanks to Dr Vipin and Dr Pallavi Mahurkar.

I had a collapsed bite because of premature loss of teeth.  I had serious dental issues and was very unconformable .  My family recommended me to Dr Pallavi Kendrekar , she dealt with my problem in detail .i underwent Implant surgery from Dr Vipin Mahurkar and also orthodontic treatment to correct my bite. thus solving my problem permanently.

Mr Vaibhav Naukudkkar
